name: Scale of Justice
description:
Justice! Justice above all!

Confess your sins and reach you life balance. Once you gain a balance, all of your sins will be absolved.

Reach the best judgement spree! With more and more difficult confession. Cause life gives you constant opportunity to sin.

How to play:

Drag your sin to a scale tray. Sum of figure fields should be exactly the same on each tray to win the round.

Warning! Playing a game won't get you absolved in a real life!
